Email_1.Subject: We Hope To See More From You
Email_1.Body:
Amazing job today on your first big
    extraction! It just goes to show how
    impressive and accurate our system is. You
    see, it is important to go through people's
    desktop so we can get scum like that out of
    reach of our children! I still cannot believe
    that a person like that was a teacher!
            
    We hope to see more good work from you.
            
    Your next assignment is ready in the Graph
    application.
